channel.title: Dethklok
channel.description: I know it's a fictional band, but still.. They fucking rock. I didn't really like death metal, until I watched some of the Metalocalypse episodes. And now they have released an album with all the songs they played in the series, but extended. Especially the song Awaken rules. What do you think about them?

item.title: Dethklok
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

That song Thunderhorse owns on GH2.

It’s one of my favorites to play.

Read full topic

item.title: Dethklok
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

I love Metalocalypse, but i don’t care much for the band itself. The singer’s growl doesn’t appeal to me.
